sentence.Network_en: Some interest rates have remained stubbornly high.
sentence.Network_cn: 部分利率一直居高不下。

sentence.Network_en: His jaw jutted stubbornly forward; he would not be denied.
sentence.Network_cn: 他固执地扬起下巴, 一副不肯罢休的样子.

sentence.Network_en: This country refuses stubbornly to make amends for its past war crimes.
sentence.Network_cn: 该国顽固地拒绝为其过去的战争罪行赔罪.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 美国大学翻译中文 - geovindu的日志 - 网易博客 ... 一味 blindly 一味 stubbornly 一呼 departing.
stubborn 顽固的stubbornly 倔强地stubbornness 倔强
She remained stubbornly in the same position ., 她固执地待在同一位置.
词性变换：stubbornly adv. 倔强地，顽固地stubbornness n. 倔强，顽强

list.abs: 有密切关系或特殊关系)巴黎可以硬说许多有影响的作家和艺术家是它的硬说- 释义(2)  【stubbornly insist】∶顽固地坚持认为他硬说他做得对附图.
in this way , I stubbornly raised my head , once again persistence , sway with tears in his eyes , my smile bright flowery bloom , Yang Qi want to fly .就这样，我倔强地昂起头，再一次执着，挥洒着眼角的泪水，我灿烂的微笑如花绽放，漾起希望在飞扬。
For all the stimulus spending , unemployment remains stubbornly high at 9.5 % ., 尽管政府出台了诸多刺激性财政支出 , 但 9.5% 的失业率始终居高不下.
If the enemy continue to resist stubbornly , wipe them out ., 如果敌人继续顽抗 , 消灭他们.

entry.tran: 倔强的;固执的;顽固的;执拗的
entry.def: Someone who is stubborn or who behaves in a stubborn way is determined to do what they want and is very unwilling to change their mind.

example.ex: He is a stubborn character used to getting his own way...
example.tran: 他性格固执，惯于一意孤行。

example.ex: His face was set in an expression of stubborn determination.
example.tran: 他脸上流露出固执坚定的表情。

entry.tran: (污渍)顽固的，难以去除的;(问题)棘手的，难以解决的
entry.def: A stubborn stain or problem is difficult to remove or to deal with.

example.ex: This treatment removes the most stubborn stains...
example.tran: 这个方法能清除大多数顽固污渍。

example.ex: The first and most stubborn problem was that of reductions in the number of aircraft.
example.tran: 最首要也是最棘手的问题是飞机数量的减少。

sentences.sentence: "she remained stubbornly in the same position"

auth_sentence.content: But, the ice keeps stubbornly coming back.
auth_sentence.res_content: But, the ice keeps stubbornly coming back.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But, the ice keeps stubbornly coming back.

auth_sentence.content: Andrew...wrangled long and stubbornly with the short man over prices.
auth_sentence.res_content: Andrew...wrangled long and stubbornly with the short man over prices.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Andrew...wrangled long and stubbornly with the short man over prices.

auth_sentence.content: Walpole battled stubbornly against the cry of war.
auth_sentence.res_content: Walpole battled stubbornly against the cry of war.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Walpole battled stubbornly against the cry of war.

sentences.en: The detective stubbornly persisted with his questions.
sentences.cn: 侦探执意继续问他的问题。

sentences.en: The old man held onto his job stubbornly and would not retire.
sentences.cn: 那老人倔强地不肯脱离工作岗位,不愿意退休。

sentences.en: This country refuses stubbornly to make amends for its past war crimes.
sentences.cn: 该国顽固地拒绝为其过去的战争罪行赔罪。
